Verses: 1 allelooyaa, Karththarudaiya Naamaththaith Thudhiyungal; Karththarin Oozhiyakkaarare, Thudhiyungal.
2 karththarudaiya Veettilum, Namadhu Dhevanudaiya Aalayappiraagaarangalilum Nirkiravargale, Karththaraith Thudhiyungal.
3 karththar Nallavar; Avarudaiya Naamaththaik Keerththanampannungal; Adhu Inbamaanadhu.
4 karththar Yaakkobaith Thamakkaagavum, Isravelaith Thamakkuch Sondhamaagavum Therindhukondaar.
5 karththar Periyavar Endrum, Nammudaiya Aandavar Ellaa Dhevargalukkum Melaanavar Endrum Naan Ariven.
6 vaanaththilum Boomiyilum, Samuththirangalilum, Ellaa Aazhangalilum, Karththar Thamakkuch Siththamaanadhaiyellaam Seygiraar.
7 avar Boomiyin Kadaiyaandharangalilirundhu Megangalai Ezhumpappanni, Mazhaiyudan Minnalaiyum Undaakki, Kaatraith Thamadhu Pandasaalaigalilirundhu Urappadappannukiraar.
8 avar Egipthile Manusharudaiya Thalaippillaigalaiyum Mirugaththin Thalaiyeetrugalaiyum Adiththaar.
9 egipthudhesame, Un Naduvil Paarvonmelum Avanudaiya Ellaa Oozhiyakkaararmelum Adaiyaalangalaiyum Arpudhangalaiyum Anuppinaar.
10 avar Anegam Jaadhigalai Adiththu, Balaththa Raajaakkalaik Kondru;
11 emoriyarin Raajaavaagiya Seegonaiyum, Paasaanin Raajaavaagiya Ogaiyum, Kaanaanin Sagala Raajyangalaiyum Azhiththu,
12 avargal Dhesaththaith Thammudaiya Janamaagiya Isravelukkuch Sudhandharamaagak Koduththaar.
13 karththaave, Ummudaiya Naamam Endraikkumulladhu; Karththaave, Ummudaiya Pirasthaabam Thalaimurai Thalaimuraikkum Irukkum.
14 karththar Thammudaiya Janaththin Niyaayaththai Visaariththu, Thammudaiya Oozhiyakkaararmel Paridhaapappaduvaar.
15 agngnaanigaludaiya Vikkiragangal Velliyum Ponnum, Manusharudaiya Kaivelaiyumaayirukkiradhu.
16 avaigalukku Vaayirundhum Pesaadhu, Avaigalukkuk Kangalirundhum Kaanaadhu.
17 avaigalukkuk Kaadhugalirundhum Kelaadhu; Avaigaludaiya Vaayile Suvaasamumillai.
18 avaigalaip Pannugiravargalum, Avaigalai Nambugiravargal Yaavarum, Avaigalaippol Irukkiraargal.
19 isravel Kudumbaththaare, Karththarai Sthoththiriyungal; Aaron Kudumbaththaare, Karththarai Sthoththiriyungal.
20 levi Kudumbaththaare, Karththarai Sthoththiriyungal; Karththarukkup Bayandhavargale, Karththarai Sthoththiriyungal.
21 erusalemil Vaasampannugira Karththarukku Seeyonilirundhu Sthoththiramundaavadhaaga. Allelooyaa.
